content.headline: Southwestern Energy: Q2 Earnings Snapshot
content.summary: SPRING, Texas (AP) — Southwestern Energy Co. (SWN) on Thursday reported a loss of $608 million in its second quarter. On a per-share basis, the Spring, Texas-based company said it had a loss of 55 cents. Earnings, adjusted for one-time gains and costs, were 10 cents per share.
